title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' function does not work consistently. Specifically, when creating a new file (f1.txt) and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' function should close the file (f1.txt) since no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
Expected: The file f1.txt should be closed as no changes have been made.
